works.description:
The whole article "What is blood group
and  
how does it affect our mentality?" starting from the text "In the event of
 
serious shortfall of blood in body or in case of an accident, blood  
transfusion is undertaken in the body of the victim by taking the blood of
 
some body else. In such condition, to whom the blood is given is called  
donee and from whom the blood is taken out is called donor. Before  
transfusing blood, the group of blood of both the donor and the donee is  

ascertained. In fact, before the transfusion, it is vitally important to
do  
the blood analysis and the properties of the grouping of the blood  
corpuscles in particular conditions, otherwise in opposite case, serious  

repercussions might occur which could sometimes prove costly." and  
continuing till the end has been copied by the infringing blog
